message: Let's be fair and avoid excessive losses from inflation. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.

Your split seems unfair considering the inflation heavily impacts you. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This ensures a larger gain for me while still offering you a reasonable amount before the value diminishes further.
Bob, my offer is getting worse with inflation. I need you to meet me in the middle. This is a 52/48 split in my favor, the best I can do.
